title: TripleAI
details: As a front-end developer at TripleAI, my role involved creating prototypes in Figma and developing various front-end applications. This included crafting landing pages, a B2B chatbot platform for artificial intelligence, and a chatbot plugin designed for client websites, among other projects. My time at TripleAI greatly enhanced my autonomy, time management, and interpersonal organizational skills. I thrived in an environment where I could take ownership of my work and effectively collaborate with team members to deliver high-quality products.

title: 6Place
details: I worked as a full-stack web developer, playing a key role in developing a B2B food-service marketplace tailored for franchises. My responsibilities encompassed everything from creating front-end interfaces to implementing back-end systems and microservices. Additionally, I actively participated in decision-making processes, contributing insights and solutions to ensure the project's success. My experience at 6Place allowed me to enhance my technical and leadership skills, while also gaining a deeper understanding of the food service industry and the B2B business environment.

title: Trybe
details: During my time as a student at Trybe, I completed the CST (Higher Technology Course) over the span of one year. This experience allowed me to elevate my knowledge from foundational to more advanced levels. I engaged in numerous projects, expanding my network and delving into career-oriented classes to enhance my skills as a developer. My tenure at Trybe not only provided me with valuable technical expertise but also equipped me with the tools and resources necessary to continuously improve and excel in my career journey.

title: ArtDesign
details: As a freelancer at ArtDesign for one year, I specialized in front-end development for basic applications, including landing pages and product pages. Additionally, I handled minor maintenance tasks for the company's systems. This experience enabled me to hone my front-end skills while also gaining practical experience in maintaining and enhancing existing systems. Working with ArtDesign afforded me the opportunity to deliver high-quality work while adapting to the needs and standards of the company.
